nodes.text: Fewer people should be encouraged to go to University
Anyone that can pay for University should be able to go to additional schooling.
Universities should only be accessible to those who have the knowledge and ability to make use of Universities.
The requirements would depend on the school and program
Not everyone needs to be a doctor or lawyer
Higher education should be reserved for those with a clear academic and professional ambition.
It seems that you are excluding trade schools in your definition of higher education.
he accessibility of trade schools should not be limited by prerequisites regarding academic abilities.

messages.text: Fewer people should be encouraged to go to University
clauses: Fewer people should be encouraged to go to University

messages.text: I think anyone that can pay for it, should be able to go to additional schooling.
clauses: Anyone that can pay for University should be able to go to additional schooling.

messages.text: Universities should only be accessible to those who have the knowledge and ability to make use of it.
clauses: Universities should only be accessible to those who have the knowledge and ability to make use of Universities.

messages.text: The requirements would depend on the school and program not everyone needs to be a doctor or lawyer, right?
clauses: The requirements would depend on the school and program
Not everyone needs to be a doctor or lawyer

messages.text: Higher education should be reserved for those with a clear academic and professional ambition.
clauses: Higher education should be reserved for those with a clear academic and professional ambition.

messages.text: So it seems that you are excluding trade schools in your definition of "higher education"
clauses: It seems that you are excluding trade schools in your definition of higher education.

messages.text: Universities should only be available to those who possess the knowledge and skills necessary to maximize their use; in contrast, the accessibility of trade schools should not be limited by prerequisites regarding academic abilities.
clauses: Universities should only be available to those who possess the knowledge and skills necessary to maximize their use
he accessibility of trade schools should not be limited by prerequisites regarding academic abilities.
